title: When I play a squishy mage against Yasuo
body:
and he crushes me at lvl 2
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/tmhnks.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:45}}'s Event Horizon can stop ALL dashes... Yeah let me just... ZONED! HAHAHAHAHA! Cast order: Dark Matter --> Baleful Strike --> Primordial Burst. Strike order: Baleful Strike (shields down!) --> Dark Matter (hits like an 18 Wheeler) --> Primordial Burst --> (hits like this http://img.theepochtimes.com/n3/eet-content/uploads/2014/03/EXPLOSION-shutterstock-80827351-WEBONLY.jpg )


Edit: This is partially a joke. It is also advice for laning against Yasuo as Veigar. Play safe and farm your Baleful Strike for a bit is what I'm basically saying. Eventually you can do that combo if you get the stun on Event Horizon.
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/bee87b02eac9cb0d51453e136c220141.jpg

http://static.tumblr.com/boniadn/srTlsfhtl/veigar1.jpg Your petty wind will NEVER STOP MY DARK MATTER! https://lynleahz.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/15220401_meteor_366968b.jpg?w=700&h=466 [Eh heheheheheheh!](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c9/Veigar.laugh6.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140205175659&filename=Veigar.laugh6.ogg)

Gotta admit though: That image is HILARIOUS! XD

I just wish people would get that my original comment is:

1. A joke on the damages his others spells deal.
2. Some slight advice when playing as Veigar against Yasuo.
3. I though this was Memes And Games... Not Gameplay (And Balance)!

> 
> Edit: This is partially a joke. It is also advice for laning against Yasuo as Veigar. Play safe and farm your Baleful Strike for a bit is what I'm basically saying. Eventually you can do that combo if you get the stun on Event Horizon.

Any yas with half a brain will NOT dash when he gets zoned by Event Horizon. He'll just toddle around and dodge the stuff that actually matters. 5 seconds later he jumps on your head and chunks you down.

> [{quoted}](name=Celeste Benal,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0fEJvlvn,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-11-19T17:26:54.937+0000)
>
> Any yas with half a brain will NOT dash when he gets zoned by Event Horizon. He'll just toddle around and dodge the stuff that actually matters. 5 seconds later he jumps on your head and chunks you down.

Yes that is true. But you can try to use Event Horizon as he dashes is what I'm saying. Just get a laugh at the late game damage jokes I put in the comment.

EDIT: First!          :3

Tried to google it afterwards... points me to RedTube.

I'll leave it right there.
Haha, except that translation means: "I fuck the girl on the right of that cat"
If it's a good Yasuo he'll start E against squishy mages and crush you at level 1
{{champion:90}} Come at me, bro.

Malz his my buddy whenever I see a Yasuo (or other assassin mid). Nothing more satisfying than ulting them under your turret.
{{champion:41}} What is this ult you speak of?
{{champion:12}} no idea
{{champion:2}}  {{summoner:1}} wtf are we talking about
play vlad, he cant wind wall that q
Wind wall actually stops the heal projectile from returning to you though.

Uh, during All For One we got vlad picked into Yasuo. They would wall at the start of a fight and the only thing it blocked was the E. I healed from the spellvamp and then the ball of..HP? or whatever it is that flies back to vlad indeed passed his wall and healed me. Either they changed it, or you are mistaken.
As well as Soraka's W passive heal if I remember correctly. Not sure about W active, but if it does block it as well, it's kinda nasty.
Block all of Vel'Koz's basic abilities. Even the ground targeted one!
{{champion:1}} Eanie, meanie, minie, BURN!
Eanie, meanie minie, EQRWIgnite Dead

i think you mean R.
(If you have ludens, tibbers will DESTROY sombody)
No. I mean Just R.
got to land that point and click stun somewhere

And then I remember I play {{champion:143}} mid and my plants can pop his shield all the time and my Q and ult completly ignore his wall-of-bullshit™ .

Ha. Ha. Ha. Ha
Best match to watch {{champion:40}}  vs {{champion:157}}  the wind is everywhere

You have problems as Azir against Yasuo??

How..?

Just because Azir was nerfed really hard this season and Yasuo just received a huge, huge buff with this new Crit mastery, starting with a {{item:1051}} and just healing against my poke so I am not able to deal enough damage to poke him down. As a result, I don't have enough Mana to kill him if I don't get a really, really early blue buff.
I'd like to point out that Yasuo does this to everyone now. Hence me boycotting League until this shitstorm known as "Pre-season" has passed.  :P

I run Azir into Yasuo pretty often, albeit he's my highest mastery champion but still, soldiers provide good harass plus u can stay far enough away from your minion wave to deny his dashes, u can use R to zone him away from you and use E if he tries to gap close onto you. The key is getting early boots to dodge tornadoes and after that just make sure u don't let him get in dash range when he has 2 Q stacks up, unless the enemy jungle camps you and has a knock up ({{champion:154}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} ) he'll be unable to touch u.

The only issue is making sure he doesn't roam and screw over bot lane after that, and harassing him with soldiers enough to delay his crit core

The problem with early boots is that if you don't get a Doran's first, you can't harass at all with your W > Q because if you do, you need to waste money on mana po- DAMMIT RIOT. Without doing that, you'll never get to back because of his lifesteal mastery allowing him to stay in lane as long as he wants unless you get a gank. I call it "his" because no other champion gets free 15% lifesteal other than him with that. At least, not as easily.
Well, it *is* only against champions now. I still find it annoying, but gotta do something against Thunderlord's or Fervor on Azir. ;)

Fervor is useless on Azir lol, his soldier attacks count as spell casts meaning that they don't stack fervor or proc its damage, the only two Keystones that work on Azir well are Thunderlords or Deathfire. Deathfire because he's a poke champion in team fights making his harass stronger and Thunderlords because his poke combo is AA-Q-AA which insta-procs Thunderlord's. You could also run Stormraider's but it would get less use unless u get soldiers on squishies

Have you tried it? It stacks. Deathfire is the one that doesn't work well because his autos don't proc it.

EDIT: I'm not sure if it still does proc the damage with the updates, but it was when I originally posted about it. I only stopped using it because the 45% CDR is just too good to pass up for me. I do know that it still stacks, and it stacks with each champ hit. Not just on each auto.
anyone against yasuo*

My last game:

Enemy: {{champion:157}} "Haha! I'm Yasuo, I'll smash this scrub at lvl 2!"

Me: {{champion:122}} ...
He definitely can. Just gotta outplay the Darius Q.

He can try all he wants, Darius' autos will simply destroy Yasuo even without Q

The guy tried doing all these fancy tricks with his E and Q, I just autoattacked him to death without my Q, as Darius I would've had to literally not attack him until half hp for him to be able to take me

Obviously if you just trade autos, Darius is gonna win. That's why Yasuo is supposed to poke with Q, get free autos when you last hit, and then dash in for the all in if you ever use Q. All while slow pushing should an all in occur. It's definitely a winnable matchup for Yasuo early, as is nearly every matchup thanks to how strong his early trading is. However, once lvl 6 rolls around, Darius should run away with it assuming he hasn't been feeding a bunch already.
{{champion:1}}  Tibbers!
level 2 not level 6
